Reviews.Title: Horrible cables
Reviews.Author: Glenn
Reviews.Content: WARNING DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!! This cable is extremely thin and cheap. I installed the original cable on my 4 cameras and all suffer huge noise.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good product
Reviews.Author: William G. Belcher "Mr. Bill"
Reviews.Content: I've found the Security Labs brand to be pretty good product.  I've used the 50 and 100 foot lengths, just don't link a 50 and 100  together because the resolution will suffer.

Reviews.Title: Thin and weak, not as advertising picture shows
Reviews.Author: JOHN
Reviews.Content: These are the only cables on Amazon that are 100' long and include power so I picked up a few (four). They arrived, white, and with all connectors but let me tell you something - they're not "Tamper resistant" by any means like it says on the box. They're cheap little headphone wire style sheathed cable attached to BNC connectors.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Terry Gaul
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased a camera security system and needed extra  cables for several of the longer runs. These cables were a fraction of the cost of the extension cables offered by the camera system vendor. They work just fine and the quality appears comparable to, or perhaps better than, the cables that came bundled with the camera system.

Reviews.Title: brian393
Reviews.Author: brianl "brian393"
Reviews.Content: I was to use this item for my security cameras. It caused a line to travel across the picture which was quite annoying.  I have since purchased Cantek 50 and 100 foot cables from this web site with no picture issues. [...]

Gold-Plated Center Conductor Pins Minimize Low Signal Loss & Help Provide High-Resolution Display Results
Includes Double Female Bnc Barrel Connector For Added Versatility
50 Ft
ProductInfo.Name: SECURITY LABS SLA31 50-ft BNC Video Power Extension Cable
